tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Writing my one year experience with Dr. Arul pradeep. I had my orthodontics treatment (braces) here. Initially i was afraid about the procedures and their sittings and then Dr. Arul understood my concern and addressed them too. And they also make sure that I was comfortable in every appointments. The doctor and their staffs were so kind and helpful.  The clinic is always clean and neat. The prices were also fair (partial payment were also done here).  Best dental care clinic in city. I would also recommend him for your dental concerns.
Thank you for the happy smile Dr. Arul pradeep!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First things first, Dr. Arul Pradeep has magic in his hands. A long history of extremely sensitive teeth had no complaints in the slightest this morning. Dr. Arul Pradeep has a calm and confident presence and is a great listener. He advises the right treatment with precision and patience. If that is not enough, he has a great sense of humour. It is not every day that a dentist and his patient celebrate the gift of laughter! We would be happy to see more people like us have their own first-hand healing experiences. Dr. Arul Pradeep is a young treasure and we can see that great things will unfold for him. We are certain Dr. Arul Pradeep is already recognised for his artistry, craft and presence and will continue to rewrite dental destinies. üòÅüòÅ
